forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy. Low around 22, with temperatures rising to around 25 overnight. West northwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 1pm, then a chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy. High near 30, with temperatures falling to around 27 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Ski center will be closed 2/8 and 2/9.   Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, February 12, 2025 . There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails. No trails on the golf course.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Due to limited snowfall trails are unable to be groomed at this time.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run was in great shape this afternoon....skate deck was wide, firm and fast and there were two or three tracks around the entire loop.  Hats off and a big thank you to the grooming team!   Hopefully Bucks Run will be complemented by the snow storm tomorrow and the other trails on the golf course are skiable as well.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Being the very first on the groom today , I am biased : but boy oh boy it is nice at Nubs Nob ! LF 6

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 5 lifts, Rope Tow, and the Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails were power-tilled and tracked on Sunday. Trails were packed again on Tuesday.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: It's a cold start to the ski day but the forecast calls for a high in the low 20's today. Over an inch of fresh snow landed at Nub's yesterday afternoon and conditions continue to be superb. More snow is predicted for this afternoon and tonight. Pintail Peak lodge is open until 3:30 PM. The Lifts will spin from 9:00 AM to 9:00 PM with an hour break at 4:30 PM to prepare for night skiing. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
